name: Chanel No. 5
description: A timeless floral aldehyde fragrance with notes of jasmine, rose, and ylang-ylang.

name: Dior Sauvage
description: A fresh and spicy scent featuring Calabrian bergamot, Sichuan pepper, and ambroxan.

name: Gucci Bloom
description: A rich white floral fragrance with tuberose, jasmine, and Rangoon creeper.

name: Armani Acqua di Giò
description: A marine fragrance with notes of sea water, rosemary, and patchouli.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
description: A warm and sweet gourmand scent with coffee, vanilla, and white flowers.

name: Calvin Klein Euphoria
description: An exotic fruity floral fragrance with pomegranate, orchid, and mahogany.

name: Paco Rabanne 1 Million
description: A spicy leather scent with notes of cinnamon, rose, and amber.

name: Versace Bright Crystal
description: A fresh floral fragrance with yuzu, peony, and musk.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: A luxurious and sensual fragrance with black truffle, black orchid, and patchouli.

name: Jo Malone London Lime Basil & Mandarin
description: A citrus aromatic scent with lime, basil, and white thyme.

name: Giorgio Armani My Way
description: A bright floral fragrance with bergamot, orange blossom, and vanilla.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male
description: A bold, spicy scent with mint, lavender, and vanilla.

name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle
description: A sweet and floral fragrance with iris, praline, and vanilla.

name: Bvlgari Man in Black
description: A bold and intense scent with rum, leather, and tonka bean.

name: Hermès Terre d'Hermès
description: A woody spicy fragrance with notes of orange, pepper, and vetiver.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue
description: A fresh citrus fragrance with Sicilian lemon, apple, and cedarwood.

name: Creed Aventus
description: A powerful and sophisticated scent with pineapple, birch, and musk.

name: Mugler Alien
description: A mysterious and enchanting fragrance with jasmine, amber, and woodsy notes.

name: Byredo Gypsy Water
description: A woody aromatic fragrance with bergamot, juniper berries, and sandalwood.

name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540
description: A luxurious and sophisticated scent with saffron, jasmine, and ambergris.
